text: aur imaan waalo aur nek amal karne waalo ko un jannato ki khush qabryaa do, jin ke niche nehre beh rahi hai, jab kabhi wo phalo ka rizkh diye jayenge aur hum-shakal laye jayenge to kahenge ye wahi hai jo hum is se pehle diye gaye thein, aur un ke liye biwiya hai saaf suthri aur wo un jannatho mein hamesha rehne wale hai
